# Scripts

Bundled resources for sql-injection-detector skill

- [x] sqli_scan.py: Script to automate SQL injection scanning with configurable payloads and target URLs.
- [x] sqli_exploit.py: Script to verify SQL injection vulnerabilities by attempting safe proof-of-concept exploits.
- [x] sqli_remediate.py: Script to generate parameterized query examples for remediation based on detected vulnerabilities.
